TopicTitle: One sentence you could say to annoy an entire fan base?

Articles.Content: Clint Eastward

The lunar conspiracy is lying.
It was okay with Apollos.

The fake were Voyagers. The planets are spots on the crystal dome.
KSP2 was never really released. It is all part of a long practical joke.
We promise regular communication updates to the community, KERB coming friday!
I can remember more American sci-fi movies, than an average American user from this forum had seen.
Pet turtles filmed in black and white and made to fly by spinning them, make the best movie monsters.
Unless they have swords and bandanas.
It is time to bring back 8 track tapes.

1 hour ago, ColdJ said:

8 track

Yes.
 

Spoiler

By tying together with tapes the 4-track Object 279 and T-28
Digital Audio Tape was great for the 1 week it was on the market.
The people, who believe politicians, accuse the people who watch cartoons about superpowered catgirls in infantilism.
May the richest candidate win.
Equestria is the vegans' hell. Only grass to eat, and the pony rides you.

GEOLOGY ISN'T A REAL SCIENCE! -Sheldon Cooper

(might offend geologists)
Sure it is safe to fly with a company that has blown up every rocket to date.

Well don't use MechJeb(ksp) because it flew from the craters sector in serpulo(mindustry) which contained kharaa virus(subnautica) brought by the space core(portal 2) that got launched by the orbital probe cannon(outer wilds) powered by update suppressors(minecraft)stopping EXO Trade Platforms(astroneer) that are carried by spidertrons(factorio) that speak (some conlang) using Hangul(this is wrong because you don't speak using a syllabary.instead you write using a syllabary.)which originated from the 7th floor of the tower of sennaar(chants of sennaar)which was built by Robert Witterel(obra dinn)who had a bunch of duplicants(oxygen not included)mass-producing O-2-56s(lobotomy) using HEAC(the powder toy)which conducts heat as fast as [a swear word],which is what you are.
Marvel mucked up the ending.
"Are you sleeping?"
"I know you haven't seen the movie yet, but this is the plot."

SpaceX Starship should replace every single rocket that either exists or are on development.

Edited April 2 by Venusian Explorer
And it should be the standard rocket.
Pistols are better than revolvers.
I like the remake better.
Buster Keaton films are better than Charlie Chaplin ones.
Hardie kept sitting on his Laurels.
DeLorien is an overestimated nothing. Just another clone of Charger.
